questionTitle: Is this your handbag? ________?
Can I have a piece of cake? You can have ________.
Do you like tea? ________.
We were happy ________ them.
There are no apples left: we've eaten ________.
John and Mary are here. ________ are my friends.
This book belongs to me, and this pen is ________, too.
Can you ________ it for me?
Kate and I are students. ________ go to the Seven Dials School in Brighton.
If students want a certificate ________ have to pass the final examination.
They forced us ________ their invitation.
I had my younger brother ________ the newspaper to me while I was abroad .
All work is better than ________ at all.
If we ________ the plan you suggest, we are more likely to be successful.
They fooled me totally. They pulled the ________ over my eyes.
I had my sister ________ my hair this morning.
They moved to Thonburi ________ May 17.
The picture was ________ in the museum.
________ study hard before an examination.
He went to bed with ________ bad cold .
